data_folder.description: Path to the folder containing the data files.

dataset.description: Name of the dataset to be processed.

adjust_longitude.description: Whether to adjust longitude values to the range [-180, 180].

convert_kelvin_to_celsius.description: Whether to convert temperature values from Kelvin to Celsius.

convert_m_to_mm_precipitation.description: Whether to convert precipitation values from meters to millimeters.

downsample_grid.description: Value of the target grid resolution.

truncate_time.description: Year to truncate the time series from.

rename.description: Mapping of variable names to their new names.
